Text:
Dear, dear, catflap. THANK YOU.
You have loyal following of people who greaty appreciate you for all the time and effort you put into capping, transcoding/encoding, and torrenting this series. 

p.s. love the anit-whining pics

I don't know about there being a loyal following :)
but when I think something is interesting and
there are no other people or groups releasing it
I try to fill the gap when I have time - because my
own downloads have priority.

So thanks for downloading my stuff. :)

Thanks catflap for some great uploads loves me some BBC comedy.....
and your anti whine campain always makes me smile.....cheers!

Oh, there is a loyal following...
Many thanks from another anglophile, your torrents are the only way I can watch this show!
